front.div:
Vectors construction. The sequence for the poliovirus internal ribosomal entry site (pIRES) was
obtained from plasmid pS1179D8 following PCR amplification using primers IRES1For, with
sequence 5'-CATGTCGACATCGATTTAAAACAGCTCTG, introducing a SalI restriction site at
the 5' of the sequence (underlined), and IRES2Rev, with sequence 5'-
CATCCATGGTGGTGGAGGGTACCTAGG-3', introducing a NcoI restriction site (underlined)
with ATG start codon (bold, in reverse orientation) at the 3' of the sequence. The coding sequence
for the mouse granulocyte monocyte-colony stimulatory factor (mGM-CSF) was obtained from
plasmid pxLNC-mGM-CSF following PCR amplification using primers mGMS1, with sequence 5'-
CATCCATGGGGCTGCAGAATTTACTTTTCCT-3', introducing a NcoI restriction site
(underlined) with ATG start codon (bold) at the 5' of the sequence, and mGMAS2, with sequence
5'-CATGGTACCTCATTTTTGGCTTGGTTTTTTGCA-3', introducing a KpnI restriction site
(underlined) with TGA stop codon (bold, in reverse orientation) at the 3' of the sequence. The
sequence for the woodchuck hepatitis post-transcriptional regulatory element (WPRE) was obtained
from plasmid R5SA-EFS-GFP-W following PCR amplification using primers WPREfor, with
sequence 5'-CATGGTACCTGATAATCAACCTCTGGATTACA-3', introducing a KpnI
restriction site (underlined) at the 5' of the sequence, and WPRErev, with sequence 5'-
CATGCGGCCGCCCGATGCGGGGAGGCGGCCCAAA-3', introducing a NotI restriction site
(underlined) at the 3' of the sequence. All fragments were separately cloned into pCR2.1 plasmid
(Invitrogen, Carlsbad, CA) and sequenced to confirm their identity and the absence of PCR-
introduced base pair errors. Subsequently, plasmid pCR2.1mZ was produced by introducing the
pIRES (restricted with SalI/NcoI), mGM-CSF (restricted with NcoI/KpnI) and WPRE (restricted
with KpnI/NotI) sequences into the SalI/NotI restricted pCR2.1 plasmid. Finally, the lentiviral
transfer vector plasmid pTY2-JRmZ was produced by insertion of the pIRES-mGM-CSF-WPRE
(mZ) sequence, after restriction of pCR2.1mZ with SalI/NotI, into the SalI/NotI restricted parental
